document.full_text: the nfl owners and players, who have not held labor talks since last month's lockout took effect, are willing to resume discussions but the sparing parties differ on who should oversee them.
document.title: nfl players and owners willing to resume talks
lines_and_colors: the nfl owners and players, who have not held labor talks since last month's lockout took effect, are willing to resume discussions but the sparing parties differ on who should oversee them.
